buyhead: We acquire your property. Reliable, fair and straightforward.
buytext: Do you own land or property in Yaoundé, Douala or other cities? Sci Hibiscus is constantly looking for land and property opportunities for the development of its projects. With over 24 years of experience, we provide you with personalised and transparent support at every stage of the sale process.
interest: We are interested in the following types of land and property:
intone: Located in Yaoundé, Douala or other major cities in Cameroon.
inttwo: Serviced or unserviced land, with or without planning permission.
intthree: Land for residential, commercial or mixed use.
intfive: Agricultural land or land for development.
intsix: We welcome offers from private owners as well as institutions, estate agents, developers, asset managers, tax advisers, solicitors and architects.
confidence: Les raisons de nous faire confiance:
conone: 24+ années d'expertise dans le développement immobilier camerounais depuis 2001.
contwo: Décisions rapides grâce à notre structure opérationnelle agile.
conthree: Confidentialité assurée pour toutes vos transactions.
confour: Transparence totale à chaque étape du processus.
confive: Solidité financière avec un capital de 1,55 milliard FCFA et un portfolio diversifié.
